p: Patients will have patient study number, which is linked to their identity for traceability. The study number is used for all documents to ensure that the patient identity is not disclosed. Only the healthcare staff in charge at the clinic have access to journals and ‘Subject Enrolment and Identification Log’ where the patient’s identity appears. All data will be confidential and password protected throughout the study. Patient identity is protected in the final report and on publication of the study.
